scripts.app:prod: NODE_ENV=production concurrently --kill-others "pnpm --prefix ./backend run dev" "npm --prefix frontend run dev"
scripts.app:dev: set NODE_ENV=development&&concurrently --kill-others "pnpm --prefix ./backend run dev" "npm --prefix frontend run dev"
scripts.app:install: pnpm install && pnpm --prefix ./backend install && pnpm --prefix ./frontend install
scripts.app:clear:files: rm -rf node_modules/ .husky/ frontend/node_modules/ frontend/.next/ frontend/build/ backend/node_modules/ backend/dist/ backend/coverage/
scripts.app:clear:cache: pnpm store prune && pnpm --prefix ./frontend store prune && pnpm --prefix ./backend store prune
